message: Let's be fair, Bob.  Take this deal and we both win.
Alice, my turn. I think this is a much fairer split, considering the inflation working against me.  Let's wrap this up.
Bob, time is literally money for you in this game! I'm being more than fair, let's end this.
Alice, this back and forth isn't helping either of us.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly.  Take it or leave it.
